title: Clinical Practical Competency Enhancement: Online Lecture Design and Evaluation Competency Strengthening Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can identify at least three online course design requirements using evidence-based standards (QM Framework).
Learners can create and apply an online course evaluation checklist through a peer-review process.

Within one week, learners develop an online course design proposal for medical/nursing industry work environments (e.g., hospital education teams, medical device companies) through project-based assessment, including three core modules (theory, practice, evaluation), and submit a final report meeting â‰¥4 of 5 checklist criteria.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
